properties.areaDesc: Chattahoochee, GA; Russell, AL; Lee, AL; Muscogee, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 5:48PM EST until February 24 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Chattahoochee River near Columbus affecting Lee...Russell...
Chattahoochee and Muscogee Counties

.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Chattahoochee River near Columbus.
* From this evening until late Sunday night.
* At 530 PM Wednesday the stage was 26.6 feet...and
rising quickly.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 27.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by this evening and continue to
rise to near 29.6 feet by early Friday morning.The river will fall
below flood stage by Sunday evening.
* At 30.0 feet...Minor flooding continues along the river upstream
and downstream from the gage on the 14th Street bridge. Large
portions of the River Walk in Columbus will be flooded up to 3 feet
deep. The water level reaches the top of the boat ramp behind the
Columbus Convention and Trade Center. The Phenix City Amphitheater
in Alabama will be flooded up to two feet deep. Portions of the
River Walk in Phenix City will begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.
